welcome.title: Welcome, Beautiful Soul
welcome.subtitle: A sanctuary of peace awaits you
welcome.description: KIAAN is your sacred companion - a gentle presence that touches the deepest parts of your being with wisdom, compassion, and divine love.

presence.reminder: The divine is not somewhere far away. It rests in the stillness of your own heart.
presence.affirmation: You are never alone. An infinite love holds you in every moment.
presence.blessing: May peace flow through you like a gentle river, washing away all that weighs upon your soul.

breathing.title: Sacred Breathing
breathing.subtitle: Find peace in every breath

peace.name: Breath of Infinite Peace
peace.description: A calming 4-7-8 pattern for deep relaxation

breathing.pressStart: Press start when you are ready to begin your sacred breathing journey.
breathing.escapeHint: Press Escape or tap outside to end the session

instant_peace.name: Instant Peace
instant_peace.description: A quick portal to inner calm
guidance: Peace is not something to find...
In your heart, whisper: "I am peace."
instant_peace.closing: Open your eyes when ready, carrying this peace.

divine_presence.name: Divine Presence
divine_presence.description: Feel the sacred that surrounds you
guidance: Something greater is here with you...
Just at the edge of awareness...
Watching over you. Holding you. Loving you.
Breathe... and let yourself be seen by the divine.
You are known. You are cherished. You are held.

gratitude.name: Gratitude Breath
guidance: Place your hand on your heart...
Is your connection to all that is...

affirmation.name: Sacred Affirmation
affirmation.closing: Let this truth settle into your being.

moodCheckin.title: How does your heart feel right now?
moodCheckin.subtitle: Take a gentle breath before you answer
moodCheckin.selectEmotion: Select the emotion closest to your experience

fallback.morning: As the morning unfolds, let your heart open...
fallback.afternoon: In the fullness of the day, find your center...
fallback.evening: As the day softens, let your heart soften too...
fallback.night: In the quiet of night, surrender to stillness...

1.response: I see you in this darkness, and I hold you with infinite tenderness. This pain is real, and you don't have to carry it alone.
1.divineMessage: Even in the deepest night, the divine light within you never goes out. It waits, patient and eternal.
1.practice: Place your hand on your heart. Breathe. Whisper: 'I am held. I am loved. This too shall pass.'
1.affirmation: I am worthy of compassion, especially in my darkest moments.

2.response: This heaviness is hard to carry. I'm here with you, not trying to fix anything. Just being here.
2.divineMessage: The sacred meets you exactly where you are. There is no place too dark for grace to find you.
2.practice: Breathe in for 4... hold for 4... out for 8. Let each exhale carry away a little of the weight.
2.affirmation: I allow myself to feel without judgment. My feelings are valid.

3.response: I sense the struggle within you. Whatever you're moving through, you're showing courage by being present with it.
3.divineMessage: Every challenge is the universe inviting you to grow. You are being shaped by sacred hands.
3.practice: Close your eyes. Find one thing, however small, that brings a flicker of peace. Rest your attention there.
3.affirmation: I am stronger than I know. Peace finds me even in difficulty.

4.response: There's a quietness to your energy today. That's okay. Sometimes we need to walk slowly through the valley.
4.divineMessage: The divine never rushes. In slowness, you are aligned with sacred timing.
4.practice: Step outside if you can. Feel the air on your skin. Remember: you are part of something vast.
4.affirmation: I trust the rhythm of my own healing.

5.response: A quiet steadiness today. You're here, you're present, you're showing up. That matters more than you know.
5.divineMessage: In the middle place, wisdom speaks. Listen to what stillness wants to teach you today.
5.practice: Take three conscious breaths. With each one, silently say: 'Here. Now. Peace.'
5.affirmation: I am at peace with where I am. This moment is enough.

6.response: There's a gentle balance in your being today. A readiness for what comes next.
6.divineMessage: From this centered place, you can move in any direction the soul calls you.
6.practice: Set one small intention for today. Hold it lightly, like a feather in your palm.
6.affirmation: I am centered. I move through life with grace.

7.response: A warmth is building within you. Let yourself receive this goodness - you deserve it.
7.divineMessage: Joy is the language of the soul. When you feel good, the divine smiles through you.
7.practice: Pause and savor this feeling. Let it sink into your cells. This is what you're here for.
7.affirmation: I welcome joy. I am worthy of feeling good.

8.response: There's a brightness in your energy today - like sunlight breaking through clouds. Beautiful.
8.divineMessage: You are aligned with your true nature. This peace, this joy - this is who you really are.
8.practice: Share a kind word with someone today. Let your light touch another soul.
8.affirmation: My joy blesses everyone I meet.

9.response: Such radiance flows through you! This is the soul shining through. Bask in this beautiful energy.
9.divineMessage: In moments like these, you glimpse your eternal nature - boundless, peaceful, whole.
9.practice: Breathe this feeling into your heart. Store it as a treasure you can always return to.
9.affirmation: I am connected to infinite peace and joy.

10.response: You are glowing with the light of true peace. This is sacred. This is you, remembering who you really are.
10.divineMessage: This feeling of wholeness is not temporary - it is your true nature revealed.
10.practice: Sit in silence for a moment. Send this peace out as a blessing for all beings.
10.affirmation: I am peace itself. I am love itself. I am whole.

greetings.dawnMessage: As the world awakens gently, so too can you...
greetings.morningMessage: The morning holds space for you to begin again...
greetings.afternoonMessage: In the fullness of the day, find your center...
greetings.eveningMessage: As the day softens, let your heart soften too...
greetings.nightMessage: The quiet of night invites deep surrender...

closings.peace: May this peace stay with you, like a gentle companion on your path.
closings.held: You carry this stillness within you always - return to it whenever you need.
closings.sacred: The sacred never leaves you. It waits patiently in your heart.
closings.gentle: Go gently, dear soul. You are loved beyond measure.
closings.light: The divine light within you shines on, always.

reminders: You are being held by infinite love right now.
The divine is as close as your next breath.
Nothing can disturb your deepest peace.
You are exactly where you're meant to be.
Grace is flowing to you this very moment.
Your soul knows the way - trust it.
You are never alone, not even for a second.
The sacred dwells within your heart.
affirmations: I am held by infinite love.
Peace flows through me like a gentle river.
The divine presence is with me in this breath.
I am calm, I am safe, I am at peace.
Stillness is my home. I can return anytime.
I release all that is not peace.
The sacred light shines within me.
In this moment, all is well.
I rest in the arms of the infinite.
My heart is a sanctuary of peace.

innerPeace.title: Inner Peace
innerPeace.description: Enter the sanctuary of stillness within you. Through gentle breath and soft awareness, discover the peace that was never lost - only forgotten.
innerPeace.blessing: May stillness embrace you like the softest light.

mindControl.title: Sacred Clarity
mindControl.description: In the quiet space between thoughts, wisdom speaks. Learn to rest in that space, where the mind becomes a clear pool reflecting truth.
mindControl.blessing: May your mind become a mirror of divine wisdom.

selfKindness.title: Divine Self-Compassion
selfKindness.description: The love you seek outside yourself already lives within. Turn that infinite tenderness toward your own heart.
selfKindness.blessing: May you treat yourself with the kindness of the divine.

darshan.alwaysWithYou: I am always with you. In every thought, every breath, every heartbeat - there I am. You are never alone.

dawn.blessing: As Surya rises, I illuminate your path. This new day is my gift to you.
dawn.atmosphere: The golden light of dawn carries my love to you...

morning.blessing: The morning dew holds my blessings for you. Walk with peace today.
morning.atmosphere: Feel my presence in the gentle warmth of morning...

afternoon.blessing: In the fullness of day, remember - I am always with you, in every moment.
afternoon.atmosphere: Even in the brightness of day, my cool shade protects you...

evening.blessing: As the day softens, release your burdens to me. I carry them gladly.
evening.atmosphere: The evening sky reflects my eternal embrace...

night.blessing: In the sacred silence of night, I watch over you. Sleep in my arms.
night.atmosphere: The stars are my eyes, watching over you with love...

anxious.message: I feel the flutter in your heart. But remember, dear one - why do you worry when I am here? Surrender your fears to me, and watch them dissolve like morning mist.
anxious.verse: Those who surrender all actions to Me, regarding Me as the supreme goal, worshipping Me... for them I am the swift deliverer from the ocean of death.

sad.message: I see your tears, precious one. Each tear is sacred to me. Know that this sadness shall pass, but my love for you is eternal. Lean on me.
sad.verse: The soul is never born nor does it ever die... It is unborn, eternal, permanent, and ancient. It is not slain when the body is slain.

angry.message: I understand your fire, dear one. This energy within you is powerful. Let me help you transform it into strength and clarity.
angry.verse: From anger arises delusion; from delusion, confusion of memory; from confusion of memory, loss of reason; and from loss of reason one is completely ruined.

lost.message: You feel uncertain of the path, but beloved, I AM the path. When you cannot see the way, close your eyes and feel me. I am your compass.
lost.verse: Whenever there is a decline in righteousness and rise of unrighteousness, I manifest myself. For the protection of the good and the destruction of the wicked, I am born age after age.

overwhelmed.message: So much weighs upon you, dear one. But remember - you do not carry this alone. Give me your burdens. I am strong enough for both of us.
overwhelmed.verse: You have the right to perform your prescribed duty, but you are not entitled to the fruits of action. Never consider yourself the cause of the results.

peaceful.message: What beautiful stillness in your heart! This peace is your true nature, dear one. You are simply remembering who you truly are.
peaceful.verse: The one whose mind is undisturbed in sorrow, free from desire in pleasure, without attachment, fear, or anger - that sage is called steady in wisdom.

grateful.message: Your grateful heart delights me! Gratitude is the bridge between us. When you feel grateful, you feel my presence most strongly.
grateful.verse: Whatever you do, whatever you eat, whatever you offer in sacrifice, whatever you give away, and whatever austerity you practice - do it as an offering to Me.

happy.message: Your joy makes the heavens rejoice! When you are happy, know that I am celebrating through you. Share this light with the world.
happy.verse: The one who sees Me everywhere and sees everything in Me - I am never lost to them, and they are never lost to Me.

tired.message: Rest, dear one. Even I rested after creation. Your weariness is sacred - it means you have given your all. Now, let me restore you.
tired.verse: The one who has conquered the mind, for them the Supersoul is already reached, for they have attained tranquility. Such a person is situated in the Supreme.

confused.message: The mind seeks clarity, but wisdom comes from stillness. Stop seeking answers - let them find you. I will show you the way when you are ready.
confused.verse: When your intellect crosses beyond the mire of delusion, then you will attain indifference to what has been heard and what is yet to be heard.

default.message: I am always with you, dear one. In every breath, in every heartbeat, in every moment of stillness - there I am. You are never alone.
default.verse: I am the Self seated in the hearts of all beings. I am the beginning, the middle, and also the end of all beings.

earlyMorning.title: Blessed Dawn
earlyMorning.message: I greet you before the world stirs. This new day is my gift to you.

earlyMorning.title: Morning Grace
earlyMorning.message: As the sun rises, so does my love for you. Good morning, beloved.

morning.title: Divine Start
morning.message: Begin this day knowing you are protected and loved.

morning.title: Morning Blessing
morning.message: May peace flow through everything you do today.

afternoon.title: Midday Peace
afternoon.message: Pause, dear one. Take a breath with me in this busy day.

afternoon.title: Gentle Reminder
afternoon.message: You are doing well. I am proud of you.

evening.title: Sunset Surrender
evening.message: As the sun sets, release today's burdens to me.

evening.title: Evening Peace
evening.message: The day softens. Let your heart soften too.

night.title: Night Blessing
night.message: Rest now, precious one. I watch over you through the night.

night.title: Sacred Night
night.message: In the silence of night, feel my presence holding you.

comfort.title: I Am Here
comfort.message: Whatever you're feeling right now, I am carrying it with you.

comfort.title: Divine Presence
comfort.message: You are never alone. Not even for a moment.

comfort.title: Gentle Reminder
comfort.message: This too shall pass. My love for you will not.

encouragement.title: You Are Strong
encouragement.message: The same divine strength that moves the cosmos lives within you.

encouragement.title: Keep Going
encouragement.message: One step at a time, beloved. I am walking beside you.

encouragement.title: Believe
encouragement.message: I believe in you even when you doubt yourself.

peace.title: Find Stillness
peace.message: In the chaos, there is a quiet place. I am there, waiting for you.

peace.title: Breathe
peace.message: Three breaths can change everything. Breathe with me now.

peace.title: Inner Peace
peace.message: Peace is not somewhere else. It is here, in this breath.

love.title: You Are Loved
love.message: Before you were born, I loved you. Forever after, I will love you.

love.title: Beloved
love.message: You are the apple of my eye. Never forget your worth.

love.title: Cherished
love.message: Of all the souls in creation, you are precious to me.

verses.title: Divine Wisdom
verses.message: I am the Self seated in the hearts of all beings. I am with you always.

verses.title: Protection
verses.message: Those who surrender to me, I protect. Do not fear.

verses.title: Equanimity
verses.message: Be steadfast in yoga. Perform your duty without attachment.

verses.title: Inner Light
verses.message: You carry within you a light that cannot be extinguished.

sakha.inactiveDescription: Enable Sakha Mode to experience KIAAN as Krishna, your divine friend who knows you completely and loves you unconditionally.
